description: Mapping from built-in roles to their granted permissions and permission sets with access levels

schema.name: role_id
schema.description: The numeric ID of the built-in role

schema.name: role_uuid
schema.description: The UUID of the built-in role

schema.name: role_name
schema.description: The human-readable name of the built-in role (e.g., Full Admin, Viewer)

schema.name: grant_id
schema.description: The ID of the permission or permission set granted to this role

schema.name: grant_type
schema.description: Whether this grant is a 'permission' or 'permission_set'

schema.name: view_access
schema.description: Whether the role has view/read access for this grant

schema.name: edit_access
schema.description: Whether the role has edit/write access for this grant

schema.name: create_access
schema.description: Whether the role has create access for this grant

schema.name: update_access
schema.description: Whether the role has update access for this grant

schema.name: delete_access
schema.description: Whether the role has delete access for this grant
